title: new command: `spack maintainers` queries package maintainers
body:
We don't currently make enough use of the maintainers field on packages, though we could use it to assign reviews.

Here are some examples:

```console
$ spack maintainers --by-user ax3l
adios         isaac-server   mpark-variant  py-adios              xtensor
adios2        jansson        mpilander      py-openpmd-validator  xtensor-python
cuda-memtest  libsplash      nlohmann-json  py-pybind11           xtl
gearshifft    libwebsockets  openpmd-api    rmlab
isaac         mallocmc       pngwriter      xsimd

$ spack maintainers adios
ax3l

$ spack maintainers dealii
davydden  jppelteret

$ spack maintainers --by-user jppelteret
dealii

$ spack maintainers --all | head -10
adios: ax3l
adios2: ax3l, chuckatkins
albany: gahansen
alquimia: balay, smolins
amrex: asalmgren, mic84
ascent: cyrush
aspect: tjhei
bohrium: mfherbst
camellia: CamelliaDPG
cardioid: rblake-llnl

$ spack maintainers hdf5

$ spack maintainers hdf5 || echo 'oh no!'
oh no!
```

- [x] add a command that allows maintainers to be queried
  - [x] can ask who is maintaining a package or packages
  - [x] can ask what packages users are maintaining
  - [x] can list all maintained or unmaintained packages

- [x] add tests for the command
